original: Ekman, Carl Johan Jakob Emil, fd. konsul, direktör, Göteborg, f. 19/10/83 i Gbg av konsul Joban E. o. Hedda Richert. G. 14 m. Eina Pripp. — Stud:ex. 03, KTH (bergssk.) 05. Verkst. dir. i Ekman & Co. A-B i Gbg. Ordf. i Sjöförsäkr. A-B Gauthi-od, A-B Pellerins Margarinfabr. o. i Margarin A-B Zenith, ordf. i -styr. f. A-B OrreforS’ Skogar, v. ordf. i styr. f. Bengtsfors Sulfit A-B o. Järnverks-fören., hand :kamm. repr. i styr. f. Gbgs hand:högsk., led. av styr. f. A-B Sv. xAmerika Linien, Brand- o. LiffÖTsäkr. A-B Svea, Försäkr. A-B Nornan, A-B Sv. Oslasiat. Komp., A-B Argo m. fl. styr. Itad. konsul i Gbg 23- 27. RVO 35, KltKrO.
translated: Ekman, Carl Johan Jakob Emil, former consul, director, Gothenburg, born on October 19th, 1883 in Gothenburg to consul Joban E. and Hedda Richert. Married for 14 years to Eina Pripp. Completed high school in 1903, studied at KTH (Mining School) in 1905. Executive director at Ekman & Co. AB in Gothenburg. Chairman of the Board at Sjöförsäkr. AB Gauthi-od, AB Pellerins Margarinfabr. and Margarin AB Zenith. Chairman of the Board for A-B OrreforS’ Skogar, vice-chairman of the Board for Bengtsfors Sulfit A-B and Järnverks-fören. Also, served as a representative for the Chamber of Commerce in the Board of Gothenburg University. Member of the Board of A-B Sv. Xamerika Linien, Brand- and LiffÖTsäkr. A-B Svea, Försäkr. A-B Nornan, A-B Sv. Oslasiat. Komp., A-B Argo, and several others. Honorary consul in Gothenburg from 1923 to 1927. Received RVO in 1935 and KltKrO.
